# [Story] ORB-056: Build client collaboration portal

## Parent Epic
Parent: #519 (Agency Features)

## Description
Create a dedicated client collaboration portal with client-specific views, approval workflows, comment threads, and limited permission sets for secure client access.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Client-specific dashboard with curated metrics and content views
- [ ] Multi-step approval workflows with configurable stages and approvers
- [ ] Threaded comments on content items with @mentions and notifications
- [ ] Limited permission sets preventing access to internal agency data
- [ ] Activity feed showing content status changes and feedback history

## Technical Notes
- Implement separate client role with granular permission matrix
- Use WebSocket connections for real-time comment updates and approval notifications
- Create audit trail for all client interactions for accountability
